!Trader Edroc: Excuse me, is this your first visit to the Hunters Village? If so, let me explain briefly about the village. Listen up... Actually this village was first formed by hunters who camped near here to hunt the mysterious creatures of Enchanted Valley. These hunters were and still are extraordinary by virtue of their prey...They have the guts to confront the royals.
